direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate boolean values but expect opposite results.
Both methods handle validation failures by throwing ValidationException.
Both methods perform validation checks on input parameters and throw exceptions if the validation fails.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require ensuring that the input is not null before performing validation.
The test setup for isFalse can be enhanced by considering the opposite condition tested by isTrue.
Both methods handle validation failures by throwing exceptions, which can inform the construction of assertions.
